name: Lime Rush
description: 2020, Indonesia. A race car driver named Tao Li walked into a bar. He demanded the best lemonade in the world. The modest bartender did not have any lemons of this quality. However, a legend says that at the top of the twin valley stands a Lime of unparalleled freshness. The inhabitants of the region still collect the best limes according to the ancestral tradition: The Rush.  Rush through the sky driving your Kart in a breathtaking sprint ! Game Design Amir AlotounouArt Antoine Adan Prog Jérôme Braëms (jerome.braems25@gmail.com) We are a team of 3 students from IIM (iim.fr)and we were asked to make a video game on the theme of lime for a Game Jam. We had a week to develop this game and our constraints were that the game had to be an interactive experience with a beginning and an end.
